name: part_011
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】SPACE for Virtual GHOST【#星街すいせい3周年LIVE】 [Ajwv4ANSSg0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Performance of '少年ブレイヴ' (Shounen Brave) concludes.
Instrumental transition scene as the stage setting changes with dynamic lighting.
Performance of 'プロミスザスター' (Promised Star) begins.

subtitles.original: 挨拶した
subtitles.english: I said hello,

subtitles.original: 物語の全貌で
subtitles.english: to the full picture of the story.

subtitles.original: 僕はそっと慎重に描いてた
subtitles.english: I was gently and carefully drawing it out.

subtitles.original: 行き詰まった症状は言った
subtitles.english: The symptoms of reaching a dead end said,

subtitles.original: 昨日も今日も一昨日も
subtitles.english: yesterday, today, and the day before yesterday too.

subtitles.original: この世界が簡単に崩れちゃう夢を見てた
subtitles.english: I had a dream that this world would easily crumble away.

subtitles.original: 怖いようなんて感情も
subtitles.english: Even emotions like "I'm scared,"

subtitles.original: 辛いようなんて泣き声だって
subtitles.english: and even cries like "It's so painful,"

subtitles.original: 絵本みたいに救い出してしまえたなら
subtitles.english: if only I could rescue them like in a picture book.

subtitles.original: 芽生えた今日の感情を
subtitles.english: The feelings that sprouted today,

subtitles.original: 絞った声でノックして
subtitles.english: I'll knock with a squeezed-out voice,

subtitles.original: 君に話そう それでも「大丈夫だよ」って
subtitles.english: and talk to you; let's still laugh together

subtitles.original: 笑い合って
subtitles.english: and say "It's okay."

subtitles.original: 思いの声の心臓を 包んで
subtitles.english: If we could wrap up the heart of these

subtitles.original: 笑い合えたなら
subtitles.english: yearning voices and laugh together,

subtitles.original: 心を救う 心を救う 勇気と呼べた
subtitles.english: I could call it the courage to save the heart.

subtitles.original: 進み始めた毎日そう
subtitles.english: Every day that's started to move forward, yes,

subtitles.original: 君は今日も平凡で
subtitles.english: you are ordinary today too,

subtitles.original: ドアの外の声はもう聞こえない
subtitles.english: and the voices outside the door are no longer heard.

subtitles.original: プロミスザスター / 作詞：JXSKK 作曲：松隈ケンタ 編曲：SCRAMBLES
subtitles.english: Promised Star / Lyrics: JXSKK Composition: Kenta Matsukuma Arrangement: SCRAMBLES

subtitles.original: どのくらい
subtitles.english: How much...

subtitles.original: 歩いてきたんだろう
subtitles.english: ...have I walked, I wonder?

subtitles.original: 怯えて過ごす毎日だった
subtitles.english: It was a daily life spent in fear.

subtitles.original: 勘違い わがまま 一太刀
subtitles.english: Misunderstanding, selfishness, a single stroke...

subtitles.original: 僕らを引き裂いていた
subtitles.english: ...was tearing us apart.

subtitles.original: 散々眺めた
subtitles.english: I gazed endlessly...

subtitles.original: 夢の続きが
subtitles.english: ...at the continuation of a dream.

subtitles.original: そうさ 傷跡に塩を塗り込んでいく
subtitles.english: That's right, it keeps rubbing salt into the wounds.

subtitles.original: だから僕は待って 待って 未来を待って
subtitles.english: So I wait, wait, wait for the future.

subtitles.original: 立って ずっと生きてるって感じてたかったから
subtitles.english: I wanted to stand and feel that I'm alive forever.

subtitles.original: だから君を待って 待って 未来を待って
subtitles.english: So I wait for you, wait, wait for the future.

subtitles.original: 待って きっと巡り合った僕らは奇跡なんだ
subtitles.english: Wait, surely we who met by chance are a miracle.

subtitles.original: どれだけ話せばわかってくれる
subtitles.english: How much do I have to talk for you to understand?

subtitles.original: Don't you see Everytime あの空を染めてけ
subtitles.english: Don't you see, Everytime, go dye that sky.

subtitles.original: プロミスザスター
subtitles.english: Promised Star

subtitles.original: どれくらい立ち止まっただろう
subtitles.english: How much did I come to a standstill, I wonder?

subtitles.original: 怯えて過ごす毎日だった
subtitles.english: It was a daily life spent in fear.

subtitles.original: 迷っては戻る 過去たちが
subtitles.english: Getting lost and returning, the pasts...

subtitles.original: 僕らを追い越してく
subtitles.english: ...are overtaking us.

subtitles.original: 散々眺めた
subtitles.english: I gazed endlessly...

subtitles.original: 夢の続きが
subtitles.english: ...at the continuation of a dream.

subtitles.original: そうさ 茜さす日々を照らしていく
subtitles.english: That's right, it illuminates the madder-red days.

subtitles.original: 変わらない想いを持っていられたら
subtitles.english: If I could keep my unchanging feelings...

subtitles.original: いいな だってずっとこれだけって思ってきたんだから
subtitles.english: ...that would be nice, because I've always thought this was all.

subtitles.original: だから君を待って 待って 未来を待って
subtitles.english: So I wait for you, wait, wait for the future.

subtitles.original: 待って 絶対約束されたものなんかないんだ
subtitles.english: Wait, there's absolutely no such thing as a promise.

subtitles.original: 答えは神様だけが知ってる
subtitles.english: Only God knows the answer.

subtitles.original: Don't you see Everytime あの空を染めてけ
subtitles.english: Don't you see, Everytime, go dye that sky.
